## Build Differences

There have been 3 build versions for DECP: Steam, Standalone and Preview.

| Icon | Name | Description
|------|------|-------------
|![DECP Steam](data:image/png;base64,) | Steam | The <span class="color-g">recommended version</span> for most users. Supports Steam Workshop, and can be launched from your Steam library. Otherwise identical to _Standalone_.
|![DECP Standalone](data:image/png;base64,) | Standalone | Can be run from any location. No Steam workshop functionality. Otherwise identical to the _Steam_. Reportedly works on Mac via WINE.
|![DECP Preview](data:image/png;base64,) |  Preview | Early preview builds available on Discord, prior to the release of 3.0.0. Preview builds are no longer published.
|![Vanilla](data:image/png;base64,) | Vanilla | The vanilla editor, installed via Steam.
